body:
Features and Enhancements

Component
  • Provider Profile
    • The "Verification Tab" was removed based on client feedback that it was no longer needed/used
  • NBO
    • On the "Find Provider" screen. The "Employed" link was moved under "Facilities" to remove possible questions and/or confusion about the reliability of the data.
  • Cost Impact (ECIM)
    • Removed the text "No Options" after a Provider Filter look-up does not return any information.
  • Help Section
    • Clarification was added to the Upload File specifications: "Population files must be no larger than 30MB."
  • Network360 Dashboard
    • The Network360 Dashboard was implemented by Zelis Network Analytics team to help our client teams explore and realize insights, faster. Within the interface, users can now view and interact with the data quicker. The new Dashboard can also support rapid report prototyping based on efforts between you and the Zelis Insights team.

      To Gain Access to the Network360 Dashboard:
      There is an upcharge fee to access and use of the Network360 Dashboard. This fee is on top of your existing Network360 contract.

      Flexibility: You can buy the number of user licenses that meet your needs.
      Example: For a team of 15 users. You can elect to buy one or more Network360 Dashboard licenses to meet the needs of your team.
      You are not obligated to buy a Network360 Dashboard license for ALL your team members.
      Yet you will need to purchase a minimum of one license to access the Network360 Dashboard.

      Expanding License Count:
      As required, Zelis can add more Dashboard licenses. Contact your Sales/Account Manager for details.
      At this time, there are no set minimums or limits on the number of licenses the Client can purchase to access the Network360 Dashboard.

      After your payment is received, Zelis will:
      Configure your Network360 Dashboard "Viewer" licenses.

      After ZNA has completed license configuration:
      Client Admin(s) will need to log into Network360 to assign client user(s) Dashboard access
      Additional details can be found in the Help Documentation under Network360 Dashboard.

Issues Fixed

User Login
  • User could not log into Network360
    • Enhanced error message to let the user know Project Settings are Missing or Invalid.
